events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster, specifically for the software developer role.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will be in touch with further details soon.
Your initial screening interview is scheduled to evaluate your software engineering skills and experience comprehensively.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the initial screening interview; looking forward to speaking with you.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th to further assess your engineering capabilities.
You have successfully completed the technical interview; the panel was impressed with your problem-solving skills.
We are excited to propose you an offer for the software engineer position. Please review the terms and respond at your earliest convenience.
We are pleased to hear that you have accepted the offer. Welcome to the team, and we look forward to your contributions.
Your onboarding process has started with relevant training sessions and setup instructions to help you integrate smoothly.
The hiring process for your position has been successfully closed. We wish you great success in your new role.
